title: Citadel and Other Spirit Bondholders to Decide if Airline Survives Bankruptcy
description: Ken Griffin’s Citadel and other Spirit Aviation bondholders will likely dictate whether the budget airline survives bankruptcy or shuts down, a labor union representing its pilots said Tuesday.
content: Ken Griffin’s Citadel and other Spirit Aviation bondholders will likely dictate whether the budget airline survives bankruptcy or shuts down, a labor union representing its pilots said Tuesday.
